doc.title: Karmic
doc.plot: Outsmarted and out maneuvered for nearly a decade by Bear, the ruthless drug dealer turned businessman, FBI agents Bauer and Fry chafe under the orders of their superiors to call off their investigation when their inside informant is killed. They start a new operation against Bear, using a new inside man, a rookie LA cop with edge. The new investigation leads from Vancouver to Los Angeles to Miami in a tangled web of intrigue with Bear incredibly, always, frustratingly one step ahead them. Agent Fry pulls her partner toward the wrong side of the law in her overzealous pursuit of the man responsible for the deaths of several of their friends.
